channel.title: Move the face of object ids
channel.description:
Can anyone tell me how to make objects like altars face a direction like (north,south, east or west)
Note: Im currenttly using Deltascape/xscape source
Please Help me
Help is appreciated

item.title: Move the face of object ids
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

Should give you a hint.
